# node-get-app-root-path

Gets a node application root and provides manipulation functions for modules cache.

## getAppRootPath

Gets the application root path.

Returns **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** The application root path

### path

Type: [string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)

## setAppRootPath

Sets the application root path.

### Parameters

-   `value` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** The application root path. Must be a valid string.

Returns **void** 

## getCallerFile

Gets the filename of the caller function.

### Parameters

-   `location` **([Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function) \| [undefined](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined) | null)?** The optional caller function in the stack.

Returns **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** The file path location of the caller function.

## getCallerDir

Gets the directory that contains the filename of the caller function.

### Parameters

-   `location` **([Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function) \| [undefined](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined) | null)?** The optional caller function in the stack.

Returns **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** The directory path location of the caller function.

## require

Dynamic node module require.
Throws if module cannot be loaded.

### Parameters

-   `id` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)?** The node module or path to require.
-   `location` **ModuleLocation?** The optional reference location for looking up the module. Can be a path, an array of paths or a function in the stack.


-   Throws **[Error](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Error)** Throws if the module was not found or it was not possible to load.

Returns **any** The required module exports

## tryRequire

Dynamic node module require.
Returns undefined if module cannot be loaded.

### Parameters

-   `id` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)?** The node module or path to require.
-   `location` **ModuleLocation?** The optional reference location for looking up the module. Can be a path, an array of paths or a function in the stack.

Returns **any** The required module exports or undefined if not found or load failed.

## resolve

Resolves a node module path. Throws if the module was not found

### Parameters

-   `id` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** The node module or path to resolve.
-   `location` **ModuleLocation?** The optional reference location for looking up the module. Can be a path, an array of paths or a function in the stack.


-   Throws **[Error](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Error)** Throws if the module coult not be found.

Returns **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** The module full path.

## tryResolve

Tries to resolve a module path. Returns undefined if the module was not found.

### Parameters

-   `id` **([string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) | null | [undefined](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined))** The node module or path to resolve.
-   `location` **ModuleLocation?** The optional reference location for looking up the module. Can be a path, an array of paths or a function in the stack.

Returns **([string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) \| [undefined](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined))** The module full path or undefined if not found.

## getLoadedModule

Gets a node module from cache. Returns undefined if module was not found.

### Parameters

-   `id` **([string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) | NodeModule | null | [undefined](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined))** The node module or path to resolve.
-   `location` **ModuleLocation?** The optional reference location for looking up the module. Can be a path, an array of paths or a function in the stack.

Returns **(NodeModule | [undefined](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined))** The cached node module or undefined.

## requireModule

Requires a NodeJS module. Instead of returing the module exports, returns the module itself.
Throws an error if the module could not be found or is a builtin module.

### Parameters

-   `id` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** The id of the module to load.
-   `location` **ModuleLocation?** The optional reference location for looking up the module. Can be a path, an array of paths or a function in the stack.


-   Throws **[Error](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Error)** Throws if the module coult not be loaded or is a builtin module.

Returns **NodeJS.Module** The NodeJS module.

## tryRequireModule

Tries to requires a NodeJS module. Instead of returing the module exports, returns the module itself.
Returns undefined if the module could not be found or is a builtin module.

### Parameters

-   `id` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** The id of the module to load.
-   `location` **ModuleLocation?** The optional reference location for looking up the module. Can be a path, an array of paths or a function in the stack.

Returns **(NodeJS.Module | [undefined](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/undefined))** The NodeJS module or undefined if not found

## unloadModule

Unloads a node module from node module require cache.

### Parameters

-   `module` **([string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String) | NodeModule)** The node module to unload from require cache.
-   `location` **ModuleLocation?** The optional reference location for looking up the module. Can be a path, an array of paths or a function in the stack.

Returns **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** True if the module was unloaded during this call, false if not.

## unloadAllModules

Unloads all cached modules (excluding non unloadable modules).

Returns **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** The number of unloaded modules.
